CustomField.description: Field available for users to request a CLMA account to be unsubscribed from CMD. Set up as a checkbox, allowing users the possibility to essentially change the Account Status to "Unsubscription Requested", and triggering a call to CMD to unsubscribe, which would then trigger the value for "CMD Master Data" to "V" and clear the IFA Nr value in CLMA.
CustomField.label: Unsubscribe Account from CMD
